TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageResolution extends System.Object

summary.span: 将打印输出的页面分辨率定义为定性值和/或每英寸点数。

span.span: Defines the page resolution of printed output as either a qualitative value or as dots per inch, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

param.name: resolutionX
param.span: 以每英寸点数为单位的水平分辨率。

span.span: The horizontal resolution in dots per inch.

param.name: resolutionY
param.span: 以每英寸点数为单位的垂直分辨率。

span.span: The vertical resolution in dots per inch.

summary.span: 初始化具有指定垂直和水平每英寸点数的 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initiates a new instance of the class that has the specified vertical and horizontal dots per inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数打印机，`resolutionX`是垂直于通过该打印机，时的方向与纸张尺寸和`resolutionY`是类似于纸张移动的方向与纸张尺寸。For most printers, `resolutionX` is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and `resolutionY` is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement. 两个值通常是相同的。The two values are usually the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数打印机，`resolutionX`是垂直于通过该打印机，时的方向与纸张尺寸和`resolutionY`是类似于纸张移动的方向与纸张尺寸。For most printers, `resolutionX` is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and `resolutionY` is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement. 两个值通常是相同的。The two values are usually the same.

summary.span: 获取页面分辨率的定性表达式（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the qualitative expression, if any, of the page resolution.

value.span: 一个 值，表示页面分辨率的等级。

span.span: A value that represents the level of page resolution.

summary.span: 获取页面水平分辨率的每英寸点数。

span.span: Gets the dots-per-inch measure of the horizontal page resolution.

value.span: 一个 值，表示页面的水平分辨率。

span.span: An value that represents a horizontal page resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数打印机，此值是与打印机，通过时的方向垂直与纸张尺寸和是类似于纸张移动的方向与纸张尺寸。For most printers, this value is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement. 两个值通常是相同的。The two values are usually the same.

summary.span: 获取页面垂直分辨率的每英寸点数。

span.span: Gets the dots-per-inch measure of the vertical page resolution.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，表示页面垂直分辨率。

span.span: A nullable value that represents a vertical page resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数打印机，此值是类似于通过该打印机，时的方向与纸张尺寸和是垂直于纸张移动的方向与纸张尺寸。For most printers, this value is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement. 两个值通常是相同的。The two values are usually the same.
